EmailTemplate.name: Pop-Up Test Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Pop-UpTest
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Pop Up Form Test Dear Valued customer,
This is a test <[[https://tools.ext.nokia.com/mktoTest/pop-up/set-your-broadband-free-popup.html]]> email to test the Pop-up form.
Test 3 - Click here <[[https://tools.ext.nokia.com/mktoTest/onenokia/new-nokia-home-page.html]]> to visit RTP page Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
